Title: Establishes an electric vehicle charging commercial tariff
Summary: Provides that each investor owned utility must file with the public service commission an electric vehicle charging commercial tariff that allows a customer to purchase electricity for the purpose of recharging an electric vehicle.
LawCode: Add ยง66-q, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT amending the public service law, in relation to establishing a commercial tariff on certain electric vehicles
